attributes.action: Stop banks, from a blanket block on crypto transactions.
attributes.additional_details: It needs legislation to prevent this sort of mission creep in this world of electronic banking. They need reminding its not their money.
attributes.background:
A bank, can warn me, advise me, tell me its a scam. But the final say how I spend my money, is mine & mine alone. What next: A block on payments to Chinese restaurants/Public bars because its bad for my health? Or god forbid I might use a slot machine.
It’s not their call on how I spend my money.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual banks.
